featured.text: In June 2017, Morgan’s Wonderland celebrated the opening of Morgan’s Inspiration Island.

In 1582, Pope Gregory XIII ordered a new calendar, which called for New Year’s Day to be celebrated on January 1.
Ancient cultures celebrated New Year’s Day on or around April 1, which roughly coincides with the beginning of spring.

other.text: The tower is built to celebrate the Seville exhibition.

definition.zh_def: 慶祝，表示對某事的高興或慶賀。
definition.en_def: To observe a notable occasion with festivities or joyful activities.
definition.example: We will celebrate her birthday with a big party.
